item.title: Welcome to the Real Space Age
item.description:
Welcome to the Real Space Age

t dawn one morning last November-just as the edge of Earth comprising Florida spun into the field of light bursting from roughly 93 million miles away-she emerged one last time from the monstrous doors of the Vehicle Assembly Building, twelve stories long but dwarfed.

item.title: Journey Through Outer Space See Our Amazing Universe (HD)
item.description:
Journey Through Outer Space See Our Amazing Universe (HD)

Take a journey into the unknown...... Fly through the cosmic mysteries and discover our Amazing Universe. The Universe is a place of mystery, violence and beauty. Gasp at the wonders of the Galaxy! Achieve a higher level of awareness. You are a part of this Universe. You and the Universe are one!

item.title: Señor Salme illustrates amazing space suits
item.description:
Señor Salme illustrates amazing space suits

We can never get enough of space suits here on TFIB, so it's only right that I share the work of Señor Salme. His illustration style reminds me a lot of P. Craig Russell, a comic book artist who's a classic in the industry.

item.description:
What We Can Learn From a Forty-Year Old Handshake in Space

item.title: (PHOTOS) See a day in the life of Pluto and some monster galaxies in this week's space photos.

(PHOTOS) See a day in the life of Pluto and some monster galaxies in this week's space photos.

Click through the gallery to see this week's helping of images not made on planet Earth. And if you need more when you're done but can't wait until the next one, here's the entire collection.
